page.title: 02HEALTH PROVISIONS
page.content: {HOSPITALS_}Most of the hospitals serving the town fall within our area. {THE EYE INFIRMARY_}it is one of the best in the country.{THE ROYAL {INFIRMARY_}has many specialised depts. including urology,clinical haematology,chest medicine,a renal unit and dermatology.{HAVELOCK_}has geriatric and infectious diseases depts and a hospice.{GRINDON_}deals with mentaly handicapped people. {THE GENERAL HOSPITAL_}has maternity, children,orthopaedic,coronary, neurology and intensive care. It also has the area's accident dept. The other hospital in our area (used to be the children's) now deals with mentally and physically handicapped children.{MAJOR CAUSES OF DEATH IN {OUR AREA ARE-}bronchitis and problems in the chest.
